citations.narrative:
Organic material, dust, and other debris has accumulated under the enclosures and in other areas of the kennel such as
floors, corners, shelves, cabinets, etc.. Disease hazards may flourish in this organic film, posing a health risk for the
dogs. Surfaces of housing facilities must be cleaned and sanitized when necessary to satisfy generally accepted
husbandry standards and practices. Sanitization may be done using any of the approved methods. Correct by December
13, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Organic material, dust, and other debris has accumulated under the enclosures and in other areas of the kennel such as 
floors, corners, shelves, cabinets, etc..  Disease hazards may flourish in this organic film, posing a health risk for the 
dogs.  Surfaces of housing facilities must be cleaned and sanitized when necessary to satisfy generally accepted 
husbandry standards and practices. Sanitization may be done using any of the approved methods.  Correct by December 
13, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
